sample_docs: Clearer, crisper video at 15 frames per second with H.263+ support Enhanced automatic voice tracking for precise positioning and hands-free camera control Full-sounding, low bandwidth audio for 128 Kbps conferences Send and receive slide presentations using a PC and a standard web browser Built-in POTS speakerphone allows you to include team members who can't make the videoconference Dual microphone support for large room coverage Share documents, files and applications with Microsoft® NetMeeting® Automatically configures for single or dual-monitor set-up Automatic back-light compensation provides maximum visibility of everyone regardless of room lighting conditions Disable far end camera control for added privacy Remote system management tools for system set-up, software upgrades and diagnostic testing Upgrade system software over ISDN lines by simply dialing a phone number Automatic ISDN set-up so all you have to know is the phone number H.323 ready for videoconferencing over computer networks Standards compliant to work with existing H.320 videoconferencing systems 3M VCS3100 provides the following extra features: Fluid, 30 frames per second video Call Recovery System (CRS) ensures that calls continue uninterrupted, even when an ISDN line fails 3M VCS3100 V.35 provide the following extra feature: Connect to T1/G1,VSAT, Frame relay, ATM and Switched 56 networks Connect at speeds up to 768 kbps Fluid, 30 frames per second video 3M VCS3100 MP provide the following extra feature: Conduct 3- and 4-way multipoint calls anytime, anywhere Choose voice-activated switching or continuous presence (split screen) to easily view everyone in the conference Call Recovery System (CRS) ensures that calls continue uninterrupted, even when an ISDN line fails 3M Videoconferencing Systems include: Base Unit (without monitor) Remote control Microphone pod Color coded cables: LAN-to-computer cable LAN-to-wall cable Microphone pod cable Audio and video cables Second monitor cables VCS cable Power Cables (Europe, UK, USA) ISDN Cable (VCS3000 and VCS3100 only) V35 module (VCS3100 V.35 only) Optional Accessories Base Unit (without monitor) Audio and video cables Power Cables (Europe, UK, USA) ISDN Cable (VCS3000 and VCS3100 only) V35 module (VCS3100 V.35 only) Explore Key Features | Technical Specs | Download Software 3M Videoconferencing |
